channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @theelusivefish @mims all good points. and i'd add journalists *should* be here because this is where their sources are.
I want women to be empowered to be equal participants in society in every way.

@mims Twitter grew out of the blogging world and the people of blogs and the norms of blogging moved here. That's why Twitter is what it is. Facebook started with students, then moved to families. That's why it is what it is.
@AdamSinger @mims Yes. Trolls follow crowds online. To say a place has trolls simply means enough people congregate there to attract trolls.
@mims That's not what's going on. I wouldn't know where to begin. There's a reason Twitter is what it is and this ain't it.
@samanthamcgarry I know what you mean. ðŸ¤ª

Dear @ziprecruiter -- someone signed my email address up to your service. Please delete the account. Thanks.

I'm super proud of the LogSeq team. They are totally focused on empowering users without lock-in and interop with a wide variety of products. They're smart (obviously) but also really passionate about using networks for intelligence. Exciting day for all of us. https://t.co/QqPytul1tA
Finally a tweet that made me LOL. https://t.co/9s6xJy9ZWw
Roe supporters outnumber Roe opponents by about 2-to-1. https://t.co/ufIsU6CMqj
Schumer says Senate will vote to codify abortion rights. https://t.co/t0tNVBnxqo
Logseq raises $4.1M to Accelerate Growth of the New World Knowledge Graph. https://t.co/qloTshFyUp

The court is a contradiction. 1. They are above the political fray, they make the right decision no matter how unfair or disruptive. 2. At the same time, they make decisions based on whether something is deeply rooted in society. Which is it? Can't be both.

Popping up every time there's a crisis, emitting rage on social media, is no answer. We got into this hole by not understanding the implications of our actions while the other side was working slowly and surely for 30+ years to get to this place.
How many people who will be enraged over the abortion decision, didn't vote for HRC in 2017 because they didn't trust her.
This would not be happening if a few more people came out to vote on election day in 2016.
To Democratic marketers (I hope there are some) -- it's time to introduce a new actor to American politics -- The Federalist Society. Treat it like the right treats Sharia Law or Critical Race Theory, only of course the FS is real. And the conspiracy is real. It's how we got here
I heard Biden on the radio this morning talking about MAGA being behind this. That's not useful and it's not true. The MAGA people will really be hurt by this. Now is a good time Mr President, to try to unite us.
This is the real Anti-People Republican Party.
This is the 1%. The Federalist Society. It's a plot to rob us of our rights. To turn America into a religious dictatorship.
Mr President here's your chance to be transformative. But first you need to learn how to talk about it.
One more thing -- forget bipartisanship. It's so totally not happening. There can't be any compromise on this, so this is a war to the end. No more Republicans.
